                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4  y -0.768836

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ⚠️DataFrame的iloc不能直接使用布尔值的Series作为其索引器，只能通过Series.values实现索引

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              >>> df.iloc[mask.values]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     a  b         c
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2    two  y  0.625245
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3  three  x -0.160513
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4    two  y -0.768836
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              >>> df.iloc[mask]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              NotImplementedError: iLocation based boolean indexing on an integer type is not available

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              # 特殊的例子

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1️⃣如果两者中至少有一个不存在，但索引已排序，并且可以与开始和停止标签进行比较，则切片仍将按预期工作，通过选择两者之间的排名标签：但是，如果两者中至少有一个不存在，并且索引未排序，则会引发错误

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [68]: s.sort_index()
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[68]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              0    a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2    c
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3    b
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4    e
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              5    d
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              dtype: object
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [69]: s.sort_index().loc[1:6]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[69]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2    c
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3    b
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4    e
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              5    d
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              dtype: object

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2️⃣重复索引不能作为切片的界限

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              s = pd.Series(list('abcdef'), index=[0, 3, 2, 5, 4, 2])
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              s.loc[2:5]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              KeyError: 'Cannot get left slice bound for non-unique label: 2'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3️⃣超出范围的[切片][]索引可以妥善处理

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              # these are allowed in Python/NumPy.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [87]: x = list('abcdef')
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [88]: x
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[88]: ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f']
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [89]: x[4:10]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[89]: ['e', 'f']
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [90]: x[8:10]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[90]: []
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [91]: s = pd.Series(x)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [92]: s
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[92]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              0    a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1    b
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2    c
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3    d
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4    e
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              5    f
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              dtype: object
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [93]: s.iloc[4:10]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[93]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4    e
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              5    f
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              dtype: object
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [94]: s.iloc[8:10]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[94]: Series([], dtype: object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4️⃣单个索引器超出返回会引发[IndexError][]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              >>> dfl = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randn(5, 2), columns=list('AB'))
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              >>> dfl
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[96]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A         B
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              0 -0.082240 -2.182937
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1  0.380396  0.084844
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2  0.432390  1.519970
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3 -0.493662  0.600178
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4  0.274230  0.132885
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              >>> dfl.iloc[[4, 5, 6]]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              IndexError: positional indexers are out-of-bounds
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              >>> dfl.iloc[:, 4]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              IndexError: single positional indexer is out-of-bounds

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              5️⃣如果设置了DataFrame或Series的行/列索引名称，则会在控制台中显示

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [335]: index = pd.Index(list(range(5)), name='rows')
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [336]: columns = pd.Index(['A', 'B', 'C'], name='cols')
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [337]: df = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randn(5, 3), index=index, columns=columns)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [338]: df
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[338]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cols         A         B         C
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rows                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              0     1.295989 -1.051694  1.340429
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1    -2.366110  0.428241  0.387275
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2     0.433306  0.929548  0.278094
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3     2.154730 -0.315628  0.264223
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4     1.126818  1.132290 -0.353310
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [339]: df['A']
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[339]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rows
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              0    1.295989
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1   -2.366110
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2    0.433306
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3    2.154730
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4    1.126818
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name: A, dtype: float64

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              6️⃣列表推导式作为索引器，速度慢

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [168]: df2 = pd.DataFrame({'a': ['one', 'one', 'two', 'three', 'two', 'one', 'six'],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 .....:                     'b': ['x', 'y', 'y', 'x', 'y', 'x', 'x'],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 .....:                     'c': np.random.randn(7)})
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 .....: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              #尽量使用布尔索引，使用列表推导式速度会很慢        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [171]: df2[[x.startswith('t') for x in df2['a']]]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[171]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     a  b         c
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2    two  y  0.041290
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3  three  x  0.361719
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4    two  y -0.238075

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              三、多索引/高级索引

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1、多级索引

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              创建MulitIndex对象

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [1]: arrays = [
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 ...:     ["bar", "bar", "baz", "baz", "foo", "foo", "qux", "qux"],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 ...:     ["one", "two", "one", "two", "one", "two", "one", "two"],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 ...: ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 ...: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [2]: tuples = list(zip(*arrays))
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [3]: tuples
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[3]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              [('bar', 'one'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ('bar', 'two'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ('baz', 'one'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ('baz', 'two'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ('foo', 'one'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ('foo', 'two'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ('qux', 'one'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ('qux', 'two')]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [4]: index = pd.MultiIndex.from_tuples(tuples, names=["first", "second"])
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [5]: index
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[5]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              MultiIndex([('bar', 'one'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ('bar', 'two'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ('baz', 'one'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ('baz', 'two'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ('foo', 'one'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ('foo', 'two'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ('qux', 'one'),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ('qux', 'two')],
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         names=['first', 'second'])
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [6]: s = pd.Series(np.random.randn(8), index=index)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In [7]: s
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Out[7]: 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              first  second
